name: Castle Conquest: Medieval Strategy
description:
Castle Conquest is a real-time strategy game with simple rules, in which you need to capture all the fortresses on the map. Build up your forces in your castles, and then send units to attack your opponents' fortresses.

In this game you will be able to:
1. Manage armies for defense and conquest.
2. Construct buildings in castles to increase warrior training speed, income, defense and other features.
3. Use special strategic tricks to gain an advantage.
4. Complete 108 unique levels and 3 war campaigns.

Game Features:
1. Simple mechanics that are easy to understand.
2. Customizable difficulty level. On high levels you will have to think through every action.
3. Active pause, during which you can give orders.
4. One-on-one battles with your opponent, as well as two, three and four at once, in the "every man for himself" mode.
